data.comment: Preston kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Martyn Waghorn (Derby County) is red-carded and dismissed.
In the minute 44, Darnell Fisher is booked for the away team.
Derby County have kicked-off the second half at Pride Park Stadium.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Darnell Fisher with Jayden Stockley. This is the first substitution made today by Alex Neil.
Alex Neil is making the team's second substitution at Pride Park Stadium with Emil Riis Jakobsen replacing Sean Maguire.
Preston make their third substitution with Ryan Ledson replacing Paul Gallagher.
In the minute 69, Tom Bayliss is replacing Scott Sinclair for Preston at Pride Park Stadium.
Alex Neil (Preston) is making a fifth substitution, with Josh Harrop replacing Tom Barkhuizen.
Liam Rosenior is making the team's first substitution at Pride Park Stadium with Louie Sibley replacing Kamil Jozwiak.
Jahmal Hector-Ingram is replacing Kazim for Derby County at Pride Park Stadium.
Goal! Alan Browne gives Preston a 0-1 lead in Derby.
